MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Dyserth Road, Bryn LLys and the surrounding area. Repairs to the underground cable outside 8 Heol Y Llys are taking longer than expected and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.50PM on 3rd February 2021.
